definition: Dabie mountain range on the borders of Henan, Anhui and Hubei provinces
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan

sentences.english: Therefore, the Tianzhu mountain area has become a model place for geoscientific research on Dabie mountain ultrahigh pressure metamorphic zone.
sentences.chinese: 天柱山地區因而成爲大別山超高壓變質帶的立典之地。

sentences.english: The metamorphic petrology of eclogites from northern Dabie Mountains was performed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了大別山北部榴輝巖的變質岩岩石學。

sentences.english: If I were a millionaire, I would give money to Da Bie Shan children.
sentences.chinese: 假如我是百萬富翁，我會把錢給大別山的孩子們。

sentences.english: They forced the Yellow River and thrust into the Dabie Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 他們強度黃河，插入大別山。

sentences.english: The general, (who was) brought up in the Dabie Mountains, came back to his hometown 30 years later.
sentences.chinese: 將軍在大別山區長大，三十年後回到故鄉。

sentences.english: The Dabie Mountains did not allow much room for strategic manoeuvre and could hardly accommodate large numbers of troops.
sentences.chinese: 大別山戰略機動範圍不大，容不下更多的部隊。

sentences.english: Petrologic features suggest that the eclogites came from ultrahigh-pressure metamorphic rocks developed in the South and North of Dabie Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 根據其特徵應該屬於大別山南部和北部超高壓榴輝巖。

sentences.english: They centralize in mountainous region of South Anhui andDabieshan.
sentences.chinese: 目前集中分佈在皖南山區和大別山區。

sentences.english: Down along the Yangtze River, between Nanking and Hankow, lies a range of hills known as the Ta Pieh Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 在漢口和南京之間，沿長江有一條山脈叫大別山。

sentences.english: The tourist resources of Dabie Mountain is rich, but the economy is underdeveloped.
sentences.chinese: 大別山地區旅遊資源豐富，但至今經濟仍欠發達。

definition: Shaanxi and Gansu provinces
Jinggang Mountains, in the Jiangxi-Hunan border region
Jinggangshan county level city in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
Xinyang prefecture level city in Henan
Huanggang prefecture-level city in Hubei
North China Plain
Pingxing Pass, mountain pass in Shanxi Province
Loess Plateau of northwest China
Xiling Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the lower of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
Tai'erzhuang district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong
Changbai Korean autonomous county in Baishan 白山, Jilin
Wuyuan county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
Huangshan prefecture-level city centered around Huangshan Mountains in south Anhui
Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
Zaozhuang prefecture level city in Shandong
Ning county in Qingyang 慶陽|庆阳[Qing4 yang2], Gansu
New Fourth army of Republic of China, set up in 1937 and controlled by the communists
